description: This product is for all the athletes out there who have a pair of shoes that is just too worn down to use anymore. The new shoe is made of 100% recycled material and is super lightweight. The shoe has a special insert to help the shoe be more comfortable. The insert is removable so it can be replaced with a new one when it starts to wear down.
